purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for

ul.li: a property that is possessed by an individual product or activity; and
a property that is a necessary conditions for membership of a class of product or activity.

li.p: the identity of a physical quantity value;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Independent_property_definition application module.

li.p: the nature of physical quantity space for a physical quantity value;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Property_space application module.

li.p: the identification of a physical quantity value by a number with respect to a scale;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Property_identification application module.

li.p: the specification that an individual activity or product possesses a property;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Possession_of_property application module.

li.p: the specification that each member of a class of activity or class of product possesses a property.
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Property_condition application module.

li.p: the nature of the object to which the property is assigned.
li.note: Individual product, class of product, individual activity and class of activity are within the scopes of the Product_as_individual, Class_of_product, Individual_activity, and Class_of_activity, application modules respectively.

uof.name: property_and_property_assignment
uof.description: The property_and_property_assignment UOF provides the ability to record information about properties and about the possession of properties by individuals and classes.
